description: Updates the configuration of an existing multi-Region cluster.

parameters.name: MultiRegionClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the multi-Region cluster to be updated.

parameters.name: ShardConfiguration
parameters.description: A request to configure the sharding properties of a cluster ShardCount (integer) --- The number of shards in the cluster.

nested_params.name: ShardCount
nested_params.description: The number of shards in the cluster.

nested_items.name: MultiRegionCluster
nested_items.description: The status of updating the multi-Region cluster.

nested_items.name: MultiRegionClusterName
nested_items.description: The name of the multi-Region cluster.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the multi-Region cluster.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the multi-Region cluster.

nested_items.name: NodeType
nested_items.description: The node type used by the multi-Region cluster.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The name of the engine used by the multi-Region cluster.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the engine used by the multi-Region cluster.

nested_items.name: NumberOfShards
nested_items.description: The number of shards in the multi-Region cluster.

nested_items.name: Clusters
nested_items.description: The clusters in this multi-Region cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterName
nested_items.description: The name of the Regional cluster.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Region the current Regional cluster is assigned to.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the Regional cluster.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) the Regional cluster.

nested_items.name: MultiRegionParameterGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the multi-Region parameter group associated with the cluster.

nested_items.name: TLSEnabled
nested_items.description: Indiciates if the multi-Region cluster is TLS enabled.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the multi-Region cluster.
